/**
 * This class was generated by Smooks EJC (http://www.smooks.org).
 */
package test.pakageName;

import java.util.List;    

public class Order {

    private Header header;
    private CustomerDetails customerDetails;
    private List<OrderItem> orderItem;

    public Header getHeader() {
        return header;
    }

    public Order setHeader(Header header) {
        this.header = header;  return this;
    }

    public CustomerDetails getCustomerDetails() {
        return customerDetails;
    }

    public Order setCustomerDetails(CustomerDetails customerDetails) {
        this.customerDetails = customerDetails;  return this;
    }

    public List<OrderItem> getOrderItem() {
        return orderItem;
    }

    public Order setOrderItem(List<OrderItem> orderItem) {
        this.orderItem = orderItem;  return this;
    }
}

/**
 * This class was generated by Smooks EJC (http://www.smooks.org).
 */
package test.pakageName;

import java.util.Date;    

public class Header {

    private String orderId;
    private String statusCode;
    private String netAmount;
    private String totalAmount;
    private String tax;
    private Date date;

    public String getOrderId() {
        return orderId;
    }

    public Header setOrderId(String orderId) {
        this.orderId = orderId;  return this;
    }

    public String getStatusCode() {
        return statusCode;
    }

    public Header setStatusCode(String statusCode) {
        this.statusCode = statusCode;  return this;
    }

    public String getNetAmount() {
        return netAmount;
    }

    public Header setNetAmount(String netAmount) {
        this.netAmount = netAmount;  return this;
    }

    public String getTotalAmount() {
        return totalAmount;
    }

    public Header setTotalAmount(String totalAmount) {
        this.totalAmount = totalAmount;  return this;
    }

    public String getTax() {
        return tax;
    }

    public Header setTax(String tax) {
        this.tax = tax;  return this;
    }

    public Date getDate() {
        return date;
    }

    public Header setDate(Date date) {
        this.date = date;  return this;
    }
}

/**
 * This class was generated by Smooks EJC (http://www.smooks.org).
 */
package test.pakageName;


public class CustomerDetails {

    private String username;
    private Name name;
    private String state;

    public String getUsername() {
        return username;
    }

    public CustomerDetails setUsername(String username) {
        this.username = username;  return this;
    }

    public Name getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public CustomerDetails setName(Name name) {
        this.name = name;  return this;
    }

    public String getState() {
        return state;
    }

    public CustomerDetails setState(String state) {
        this.state = state;  return this;
    }
}

 * This class was generated by Smooks EJC (http://www.smooks.org).

package test.pakageName;


public class Name {

    private String firstname;
    private String lastname;

    public String getFirstname() {
        return firstname;
    }

    public Name setFirstname(String firstname) {
        this.firstname = firstname;  return this;
    }

    public String getLastname() {
        return lastname;
    }

    public Name setLastname(String lastname) {
        this.lastname = lastname;  return this;
    }
}

/**
 * This class was generated by Smooks EJC (http://www.smooks.org).
 */
package test.pakageName;


public class OrderItem {

    private String position;
    private String quantity;
    private String productId;
    private String title;
    private String price;

    public String getPosition() {
        return position;
    }

    public OrderItem setPosition(String position) {
        this.position = position;  return this;
    }

    public String getQuantity() {
        return quantity;
    }

    public OrderItem setQuantity(String quantity) {
        this.quantity = quantity;  return this;
    }

    public String getProductId() {
        return productId;
    }

    public OrderItem setProductId(String productId) {
        this.productId = productId;  return this;
    }

    public String getTitle() {
        return title;
    }

    public OrderItem setTitle(String title) {
        this.title = title;  return this;
    }

    public String getPrice() {
        return price;
    }

    public OrderItem setPrice(String price) {
        this.price = price;  return this;
    }
}

                      xmlns:jb="http://www.milyn.org/xsd/smooks/javabean-1.2.xsd"
                      xmlns:edi="http://www.milyn.org/xsd/smooks/edi-1.2.xsd">

    <!--
        Generated by Smooks EJC (Edifact Java Compiler).
    -->

    <params>
        <param name="stream.filter.type">SAX</param>
    </params>

    <edi:reader mappingModel="/test/pakageName/edimappingconfig.xml" validate="false" />


    <jb:bean beanId="order" class="test.pakageName.Order" createOnElement="Order">
        <jb:wiring property="header" beanIdRef="header" />
        <jb:wiring property="customerDetails" beanIdRef="customerDetails" />
        <jb:wiring property="orderItem" beanIdRef="orderItem" />
    </jb:bean>

    <jb:bean beanId="header" class="test.pakageName.Header" createOnElement="header">
        <jb:value property="orderId" decoder="String" data="header order-id"/>
        <jb:value property="statusCode" decoder="String" data="header status-code"/>
        <jb:value property="netAmount" decoder="String" data="header net-amount"/>
        <jb:value property="totalAmount" decoder="String" data="header total-amount"/>
        <jb:value property="tax" decoder="String" data="header tax"/>
        <jb:value property="date" decoder="org.milyn.javabean.decoders.DateDecoder" data="header date">
            <jb:decodeParam name="format">yyyyMMdd</jb:decodeParam>
        </jb:value>
    </jb:bean>

    <jb:bean beanId="customerDetails" class="test.pakageName.CustomerDetails" createOnElement="customer-details">
        <jb:value property="username" decoder="String" data="customer-details username"/>
        <jb:wiring property="name" beanIdRef="name" />
        <jb:value property="state" decoder="String" data="customer-details state"/>
    </jb:bean>

    <jb:bean beanId="name" class="test.pakageName.Name" createOnElement="name">
        <jb:value property="firstname" decoder="String" data="name firstname"/>
        <jb:value property="lastname" decoder="String" data="name lastname"/>
    </jb:bean>

    <jb:bean beanId="orderItem" class="java.util.ArrayList" createOnElement="Order">
        <jb:wiring beanIdRef="orderItem_entry" />
    </jb:bean>

    <jb:bean beanId="orderItem_entry" class="test.pakageName.OrderItem" createOnElement="order-item">
        <jb:value property="position" decoder="String" data="order-item position"/>
        <jb:value property="quantity" decoder="String" data="order-item quantity"/>
        <jb:value property="productId" decoder="String" data="order-item product-id"/>
        <jb:value property="title" decoder="String" data="order-item title"/>
        <jb:value property="price" decoder="String" data="order-item price"/>
    </jb:bean>
